SpecialTransferType.name: Change in the Controlling Ownership Interest of the Promoter(s) in the Transferor
Change in the Controlling Ownership Interest of the Promoter(s) as a result of merger, amalgamation, demerger or corporate insolvency resolution plan
Conversion of a sole proprietorship or limited liability partnership into a body corporate
Conversion of a partnership into a limited liability partnership
Conveyance of leasehold rights to the successor(s) of the Promoter(s) due to the death of the Promoter(s)
